thread.title: Cesar Millan believes that millennials should not own dogs | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Cesar Millan believes that millennials should not own dogs | Daily Mail Online

author: Natalie Corner For Mailonline
title: Cesar Millan believes that millennials should not own dogs | Daily Mail Online
text: 'Millennials shouldnâ€™t be raising dogs': Cesar Millan says young people are using pets as replacements for BABIES (but can't handle the responsibility as they're always on their phones) Cesar, 47, aka 'The Dog Whisperer', is a self-taught dog behaviourist His methods are hotly debated among vets and other dog trainers Says that it is important to understand the psychology of a dog and its needs Believes that people today are too engrossed in their phones than real life Advises those considering getting a dog to try fostering first
